#this file is automatically generated
if(PKGCONFIG_FOUND)
    pkg_check_modules(FREETYPE freetype2)
    link_directories("${FREETYPE_LIBRARY_DIRS}")
endif()

SET(TARGET_SRC osgtracking.cpp )
SET(TARGET_ADDED_LIBRARIES osgStupeflix )

FIND_PACKAGE(M)
FIND_PACKAGE(OpenCV)
IF(NOT OpenCV_FOUND OR NOT M_FOUND)
    ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DTRACKING_NOT_SUPPORTED=1)
    MESSAGE("[Warning] Tracking not supported. Install OpenCV 3.0.0")
ENDIF()

IF(OpenCV_FOUND AND M_FOUND)
    SET(OPENCV_FULL_LIBS ${OpenCV_LIBS} ${M_LIBRARY})
    INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${OpenCV_INCLUDE_DIRS})
ENDIF()

# TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${OPENCV_FULL_LIBS})

#SET(TARGET_EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES ${OPENGL_LIBRARIES} )
#### end var setup  ###
SETUP_EXAMPLE(osgtracking)
